layout.singingstanza: I'm a beg -- gar 'cause... I'm blind So I take what I... can find I'm grop -- ing for re -- a... li -- ty On -- ly wish -- ing I... could see My par -- ents, they can see Why is this blind -- ness in me? All I know is I want to see re -- al -- i -- ty.

lyrics.stanza: I'm a beggar 'cause... I'm blind So I take what I... can find I'm groping for rea...lity Only wishing I... could see My parents, they can see Why is this blindness in me? All I know is I want to see reality.

Lord, I am sitting by... the road Begging outside of Je...richo Now, Lord I hear that You... pass by Lord, Son of David... I cry Lord, Son of David, I cry Please, Christ, don't pass me by I believe that you can open my eyes.

You gave me life but where's... my sight? I am still blind and that's... my plight Blind lead the blind and then... both fall So right now on You... I call Jesus have mercy on me Open my eyes that I might see All I know is my only hope is in You.

Lord I am rebuked by... the crowd For You I cry out more... the loud All the world wants to di...stract me So I forget that I... can't see Jesus don't leave me behind You are the one I want to find All I know is I just really need You.

Still I'm afraid that You'll... go on But joyful ears hear You... respond What would you like for me... to do Oh Christ I just want to see You Open my eyes to... see You Let me find what my spirit can do All I know is I just want to see You.

In my spirit I... can see Because that's where You... touch me By your touch dear Lord... I'm healed All my sin and death... must yield Now Lord, I am healed In my spirit You are so real All I know is I want to keep touching You.

Lord my sight is for... one thing So that I to You... can cling I think I'm in love... with You No one else for me... will do Lord Christ let me follow You please You're so real and so special to me All I know is Lord I never want to leave.
